welcome_message_body: Welcome to Llavallol, Argentina! Experience the charm of our quaint town and discover its historical landmarks, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Llavallol has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main international terminal, serving most international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights within Argentina.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal building, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at El Palomar Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Plata Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at La Plata Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
